message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $10,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $10,000 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $7,500. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 is a fair reflection of the product's value, I'm willing to come down slightly. How about $9,200?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,200 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $7,000. Can you consider that?
